article.name: Burnt Blahrfogin
article.description:
This is the result of an automated Photoshop script, which could convert any thin black text into a burntout image like this one below.
Basically, I found someone online, told them to give me a word... and 30 secs later I uploaded this as proof of my little script.
article.keywords: burnt, text, photoshop, blahrfogin, automated, text, thin, black.
